short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple Chrome extension generates QR code from active tab's URL. Click icon to view in popup. Simple and easy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "QR Express" Chrome extension generates a QR code from the URL of the active tab and displays it in a popup when the user clicks the extension icon. 

This makes it easy for users to generate a QR code for any website quickly they are currently browsing, which can help share the website with others or rapidly access the website on a mobile device. The popup includes a download button that allows users to download the QR code as a PNG image. 

Overall, the extension is simple, easy to use, and provides a valuable function for anyone who frequently uses QR codes.
